description.displayText: Fran is an absolute joy to be around.  She is obviously a complete professional and an open, honest, genuine person.  She will make her next family very lucky to call her their nanny.
description.originalText: Fran is an absolute joy to be around.  She is obviously a complete professional and an open, honest, genuine person.  She will make her next family very lucky to call her their nanny.

description.displayText: Fran was a pleasure to meet, unfortunately our schedules didn't sync.  She was warm and connected right away with our little one.  Fran would make a great addition to a lucky family.
description.originalText: Fran was a pleasure to meet, unfortunately our schedules didn't sync.  She was warm and connected right away with our little one.  Fran would make a great addition to a lucky family.

description.displayText:
Fran has been our nanny, as part of a nanny share, for the last three years, starting when my son and our friend's son were newborns. I can't say enough about her. She has cared for my child like he was her own, helped me be a better parent and has been a truly wonderful addition to our family. 

When my son was a baby, she alone was able to get him to take a bottle (she invented a song about him and his bottle that I swear did the trick!) and move from co-sleeping to a crib. She was an incredible source of support when my son was found to be dairy intolerant, and she helped me navigate early parenthood in the midst of exhaustion. Now, with two toddlers, she's equally expert, but in different ways. She's taught them to count and sing the alphabet; they go on adventures to museums and parks; if they master using a potty, it will be thanks to her. 

Fran is fun and kind. She's tough when needed. She's thoughtful and attentive. Any family she works with will be lucky to have her.

description.displayText:
Fran is amazing. She has been the nanny for my 2.5 year old son and another boy since they were a couple months old. I cannot say enough good things about her. 

Fran started caring for my son when he was 3 days old. She was his baby nurse and I didn't know how lucky I was to have found her until I got a bad infection and had to go to the ER without my 5 day old newborn. We immediately had to figure out pumping and bottles and everything else, all while I was in the hospital. Fran was so incredibly supportive in those scary weeks. She took such amazing care of my son. 

She is also excellent in our nanny share, something that can be really tricky. Fran is loving and firm with our kids and honest and straightforward with us. She sends pictures and updates of what she and the kids are doing throughout the day. She taught our boys to be polite and respectful even as they dealt with all of the difficulties of sharing :).

Fran is part of our family. I cannot recommend her highly enough.

description.displayText: Fran has been a great babysitter and house cleaner. She's dependable, punctual, and caring towards our kids. She does an impeccable job cleaning our apartment. A total professional. Our only concern is that she'll become so popular that she won't be available when we need her!
description.originalText: Fran has been a great babysitter and house cleaner. She's dependable, punctual, and caring towards our kids. She does an impeccable job cleaning our apartment. A total professional. Our only concern is that she'll become so popular that she won't be available when we need her!

description.displayText: As the Speech Therapist of one of Fran's 'kids', I got to see her in action as a caregiver and was thoroughly impressed with her warmth, energy and obvious expertise as a caregiver. The Mother of the child seemed full of respect and gratitude that can only be earned with good work and professionalism. Fran was able to integrate all my suggestions into the young girl's routine in her own creative ways, helping her improve and thrive developmentally speaking...while always respecting the wishes of the child's mother. Personally, I would not hesitate to have Fran care for my child.

description.displayText: Our family lost Francia after 4 years due to us moving to another state but it was a joy to have her as a part of our family; taking care of our boys. Fran is a very reliable, caring, loving, warm soul. The boys love and miss her dearly.
description.originalText: Our family lost Francia after 4 years due to us moving to another state but it was a joy to have her as a part of our family; taking care of our boys. Fran is a very reliable, caring, loving, warm soul. The boys love and miss her dearly.

description.displayText: Francia is a warm, trustworthy and loving woman with a strong work ethic and a good moral compass.
description.originalText: Francia is a warm, trustworthy and loving woman with a strong work ethic and a good moral compass.

description.displayText: Fran is a loving, smart, reliable nanny who has been a wonderful part of our family for the last 2 years. She began working with us when our daughter was three weeks old and helped us establish and maintain many necessary routines such as: nap schedules, bed times, feeding times, bath time, brushing teeth, etc. Often this was not easy such as nap time but Fran's patience and calm demeanor never wavered even through the most trying temper tantrums. She is a saint! In addition, she is very friendly and made lots of friends with other parents and nannies in our building and at the park. As a result our daughter had play dates and friends all around our neighborhood! As a working Mom, it was such a treat to have Fran send me pictures of her as well as updates on her naps, their activities and how their day is going. When our daughter was diagnosed with a speech delay, Fran jumped right in and actively participated in her therapy and the follow up tasks we were given as a family. Our daughter's therapists praised her efforts to us often. She is very reliable and punctual and worked with our crazy work schedules, making our lives so much easier on every level.   She would be a welcome addition to any family.

description.displayText: Francia works for me cleaning our guest house. She is reliable, conscientious, punctual, and trustworthy. She also works as a day care provider and I know she does a fantastic job. I would not hesitate to recommend her highly.
